editor-devtools/help-by: 由{url}和Scratch扩展贡献者以及翻译者制作
editor-devtools/ctrl-space-desc: 弹出搜索框，您可以在框内中输入一个积木名称（也可以仅输入名称的一部分），您需要将输入的积木拖动至脚本区中方可使用。
editor-devtools/interactive-find-bar-des: 通过点击在代码，造型，声音选项卡右边的搜索栏，快速查找完毕后跳转到任何该角色的自制积木、变量、事件或头积木（顶部带弧）。
editor-devtools/improved-tidy-up-desc: 在右键脚本区弹出的菜单栏中，选择整理积木+选项。使用此功能来整理积木，会对齐注释并且删除未拼接上的积木。
editor-devtools/help-make-space-desc: 右键Scratch积木并选择“增大空隙”与其它积木保持一些距离。
editor-devtools/copy-to-clipboard-desc: 右键Scratch积木，有3种新选项来复制全部、复制积木和剪切积木。全部复制将把所有积木（包括您选中的积木以及其它）复制到剪贴板。复制积木将会复制选中的积木及其内容，但不复制其它。剪切积木将复制选中的积木并将其从Scratch脚本区中删除。
editor-devtools/paste-from-clipboard-des: 从剪贴板中粘贴，但是它会将要粘贴的积木粘贴到鼠标的位置。
editor-devtools/swap-variable-desc: 右键变量积木中的新选项。它能使您将此变量相关的积木更改至角色积木。当您犯了错误，想要从一个变量切换到另一个变量，或者需要从“适用于所有精灵”更改为“仅适用于此精灵”时，这非常有用。此选项不会删除旧变量，也不会影响任何其他精灵变量。
editor-devtools/middleclick-desc: Using the middle mouse button on a variable or custom block allows you to jump to its definition or open it in the interactive find bar.
editor-devtools/ctrl-lr-desc: Navigate to previous / next visited position in the script window (after using the navigate to block or find bar). This allows you to middle click a custom block to go to its definition, then press ctrl + Left to go back to where you were before.
editor-devtools/find-bar-costume-desc: Click to list all costumes by name, and type to locate one. Use the arrow keys or mouse to click a name to jump straight to that costume.
editor-devtools/ctrl-lr-costume-desc: These keys navigate you to the previous / next costume in the sprite.
editor-devtools/send-top-bottom: Send to Top, Send to Bottom
editor-devtools/send-top-bottom-desc: Right click a costume and 2 new menu items are present. These can be used to send the clicked sprite to the top or bottom of the list of costumes for fast re-ordering.
editor-devtools/orphaned: {count, plural, one {Developer tools: Delete 1 orphaned reporter block?} other {Developer tools: Delete # orphaned reporter blocks?} }
editor-devtools/replace: Developer tools: Switch all {name} in this sprite for the variable named:
editor-devtools/extension-description-no: Scratch 3 Developer Tools to enhance your Scratch Editing Experience on https://scratch.mit.edu
